name: Clash Caddie Notes
description:
Clash Caddie Notes is the BEST and ONLY tournament companion app.

With Clash Caddie Notes you will be able to catalogue all your tournaments notes and print them out in a nicely formatted PDF to reference during your tournament round.

Features:
- Input every possible adjustment
- Ability to add supporting images to the notes
- Updated every week to include new tournaments (The app will automatically pull the data when its available)
- PDF's contain course, club, ball stat images for easy reference
More to come...
